description:
This article by Sentient is published here as part of the global journalism collaboration Covering Climate Now. The meat industry and its proponents worked hard in 2024 — not only to increase sales, but also to rebrand and remain relevant. While overwhelming climate science continues to point out the harmful impacts of animal agriculture, and plant-based […]

The post How Big Meat Worked to Rebrand in 2024 — Using Disinformation appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How Big Meat Worked to Rebrand in 2024 — Using Disinformation
